name: purge_haplotigs_readhist
title: Purge Haplotigs Readhist
summary: Create a read coverage histogram to determine cutoff for Purge Haplotigs

inputSpec.name: bam
inputSpec.label: BAM
inputSpec.help: BAM file produces from mapping subreads to the priamry contigs.

inputSpec.name: genome
inputSpec.label: Reference Genome
inputSpec.help: The reference genome for this species, may be primary contigs from FALCON-unzip

outputSpec.name: genome_coverage
outputSpec.label: Genome Coverage
outputSpec.help: A file containing genome coverage for the raw reads aligned to the reference genome.

outputSpec.name: histogram
outputSpec.label: Histogram Image
outputSpec.help: A histogram to use to identify haploid peaks corresponding incorrect assignment of haplotypes in primary contigs.
